articles.title: Veteran actor Gufi Paintal, who played the role of Shakuni Mama in 'Mahabharat', hospitalised; condition c - The Economic Times
articles.description: Veteran actor Gufi Paintal, known for his role as Shakuni Mama in 'Mahabharat', has been hospitalized for over a week due to age-related heart and kidney issues. He is said to be in critical condition at Bellevue Multispeciality Hospital in Andheri, Mumbai.
